alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 21 at 1:31AM PDT until August 21 at 6:30AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Inyo County in south central California... Esmeralda County in south central Nevada... Northwestern Nye County in south central Nevada... * Until 630 AM PDT. * At 131 AM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain producing flash flooding across much of northern Inyo...Esmeralda...and western Nye Counties. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Roadways in the area may be impassable and mountain roads will be prone to rock and mudslides. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Bishop, Lida, Dyer, Coaldale, Tonopah Test Range, Big Pine, Beatty, South Lake, Aspendell, Gold Point, Lida Junction, Silver Peak, Goldfield, Scottys Castle, Scottys Junction, Mesquite Springs Campground, Fish Lake Valley Campground, Westgard Pass, Ancient Bristlecone Visitors Center and Grandview Campground. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
